channel.title: C#.Net on JNyman.com
channel.description: Recent content in C#.Net on JNyman.com

item.title: Excel Extensions
item.description: Excel extensions extend the range object to use LinqTo2dArray (see also Codeplex). It also includes other extensions. RowsCount: Count total rows in all areas. Parse: Parse congruent range into an object by row-object arrays. This doesnâ€™t necessarily need to be congruent, in the future I may make it so it skips to different areas in the range. ToArray: Copies the elements of the 2D object array row wise to a new array of the specified element type and length.

item.title: LinqTo2dArray
item.description: LinqTo2dArray written in C# (to allow iteration over the rows). Also found on CodePlex. Parse will take a 2D Array (not necessarily zero based) and load it into a class. Parse 2D object array into a class row wise. Compose will create 2D object array from enumerable type. Copies the elements of the 2D object array row wise to a new array of the specified element type and length. using System; using System.
